name: Tower of Doom
description:
Tower of Doom is a VR arcade shooter in which the player has to survive multiple waves of enemies in different levels. Each round the player gets to choose one out of four auto-generated guns in order to move up the highscoreboard and make it to the next stage.

Game Modes


Normal Mode:
You play each round in a new level with increasing difficulty. Before each round, you can choose an additional auto-generated gun, and in a mini-game you can regenerate your health and shields, upgrade your weapons and get back one of four energy impulses.

Arcade Mode:
You fight only in one level against never-ending waves of enemies. You have no way to regenerate your shields and only four energy impulses. Use them wisely. You can regenerate your health only through very high killstreaks. After every wave you can get one random gun.

The game has 5 different difficulty settings.

Upcoming features


Much more levels, enemies and guns with intressing abilities.
